caption.p: The morphological alterations in MCF-7 cancer cells after treatment with ( b) plant extract, ( c) chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles, and ( d) green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles. The live/dead MCF-7 cancer cells stained with green and red fluorescent dye respectively after treatment with ( f) plant extract, ( g) chemically synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles, and ( h) green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles. ( a) and ( e) controls. (Scale bar = 100 Âµm).
